scripts.install: npm install --save @assemblyscript/loader && npm install --save-dev assemblyscript && npm install --save assemblyscript-json
scripts.asbuild-unopt: npm run asbuild-proxy:untouched  && npm run asbuild-library:untouched
scripts.asbuild-all: npm run asbuild-proxy:untouched && npm run asbuild-proxy:optimized && npm run asbuild-library:untouched && npm run asbuild-library:optimized
scripts.asbuild-all-untouched: npm run asbuild-proxy:untouched && npm run asbuild-library:untouched
